allow: Bash(timeout 20 powershell -Command "while ($true) { $file = Get-ChildItem tests\integration\match_tests\single_match_*.json | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if ($file.LastWriteTime -gt (Get-Date).AddMinutes(-2)) { Write-Host ''New file found:'' $file.Name; Get-Content $file.FullName | python -m json.tool | Select-Object -First 100; break } else { Write-Host ''Waiting for new results...''; Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 } }")
